reporter_caption.center: MACK v. CITY OF DETROIT, 464 Mich. 874 (2001)

opinion.opinion_text: On order of the Court, the motion for stay of proceedings is denied as unnecessary pursuant to MCR 7.309(C)(5)(a). No further proceedings may be conducted in the trial court until final resolution of this appeal. Reported below: 243 Mich. App. 132.Page 875
